roleset.name: shape
roleset.note: MOLD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mold' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from mold.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: [CNN's viewer habits]-1 have been molded [*-1]by its format.

example.name: all args
example.text: John's sullen insolence molded Mary into the violent abuser she is today.
example.arg: into the violent abuser she is today
